categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Gareth Edwards (born June 1, 1975[source?]) is an English film director, who directed the 2016 Star Wars Anthology film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. His previous films include Monsters and 2014's Godzilla.

He also made a cameo appearance in the film as the Rebel Soldier who detached the Tantive IV from the Profundity and in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi as a Resistance trooper in the trench at the Battle of Crait.
